name: Stay Away From Me
description:
Objective: 

  • Kill the Undrawn-faced guys and collect tomes

Controls:

  • LMB - Shoot and Move. You move to the opposite angle of where you shoot.
  • Space - Break (Slow down movement) 
  • Tab - Pause Menu

Audio (free assets by): 

  • Cabled_mess (Unity Assets)
  • Dustyroom (Unity Assets)
  • Marching Dream (Unity Assets)
  • Olivier Girardot (Unity Assets)
  • Ostyx (Youtube)

Team: SennyCraft
